snippet: The United States women’s national team continues to stand by goalkeeper Hope Solo, who faces domestic violence charges in Washington State.
abstract: United States women’s national soccer team continues to stand by goalkeeper Hope Solo, who faces domestic violence charges in Washington State.
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s national team continues to stand by goalkeeper Hope Solo, who faces domestic violence charges in Washington State.

headline.main: Hope Solo on U.S. Roster for Concacaf Championships
